definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: These are usually associated with a major publisher and a strong brand.
sentences.chinese: 他們通過與一個大型的發行商和很強的品牌相關聯。

sentences.english: They decided to become free traders, specializing in textiles and gemstones.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定當自由行商，專做紡織品和寶石生意。

sentences.english: What business model will work best for our company?
sentences.chinese: 對咱們公司來說最爲效率的行商模式是什麼樣的呢？

sentences.english: He started Softbank in 1981 as a publisher of software and media.
sentences.chinese: 他於1981年創立軟銀，作爲軟件和媒體的發行商。

sentences.english: We do reserve the right to stop selling for vendors that have too high of a chargeback rate.
sentences.chinese: 我們保留對有高拒付率的發行商停止爲其銷售的權利。

sentences.english: All revenue to the publisher comes from either sponsorship and product placement or advertising.
sentences.chinese: 發行商的所有收入來自贊助和產品放置或廣告。

sentences.english: Abstrac: The Cohong is the product of opening trade policy of Qing government.
sentences.chinese: 行商是清政府對外貿易政策的產物。

sentences.english: For now, most publishers are still wary about releasing books without copyright DRM.
sentences.chinese: 目前，多數發行商對於發佈沒有版權的書本感到擔憂。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong film has attracted the attention of distributors across Asia and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 這部香港電影吸引了不少亞洲和歐洲的電影發行商。

sentences.english: The console game publishers took notice.
sentences.chinese: 掌機遊戲發行商開始對此投以關注。

sentences.english: Skadden is advising the issuer on Hong Kong and U. S. law.
sentences.chinese: 世達爲發行商提供香港和美國的法律顧問服務。

sentences.english: On the DS, there are some publishers that have been successful outside of Nintendo.
sentences.chinese: 在DS上，除了任天堂也有一些別的成功的發行商。

sentences.english: Every business is a multi-channel publisher now.
sentences.chinese: 現在，每個企業都是一個多渠道發行商。

sentences.english: The government 's foreign policy be savage .
sentences.chinese: 行商是清政府對外貿易政策的產物。
能否成爲你們的發行商？

businessmen and travelers/traveling merchant/(Tw) business hotel
having trading relations (of nations or regions)
to purchase goods (for a company etc)
